thread.title: Beyonce Won’t Perform at Coachella 2017; Will Headline Next Year
thread.title_full: Beyonce Won’t Perform at Coachella 2017; Will Headline Next Year

author: Alex Stedman
title: Beyonce Won’t Perform at Coachella 2017; Will Headline Next Year
text:
Matt Sayles/Invision/AP  28PM PT 
After a bombshell announcement early this month that she is pregnant with twins, Beyonce will not perform at this year’s Coachella as previously announced, but will headline in 2018, according to the Associated Press . 
Beyonce’s Parkwood Entertainment and festival producer Goldenvoice said in a statement that Beyonce is “following the advice of her doctors to keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months.” 
More to come…
